adminConfigMessage.name: Current server configuration.
adminConfigMessage.value: The following message has all the unique configuration of this server, manual modifications will damage the bot.

embed.title: Config Channel
description: This is the channel dedicated to the current and unique configuration file of this server.
The use of this channel is exclusive for administrators and its changes affect some features of **{name}** such as defined channels, roles or command usage.
THIS CHANNEL IS NOT FOR CHAT USE, WRITING HERE OR DELETING MESSAGES WILL DAMAGE THE BOT'S OPERATION..
